name: TableSort
description: Manages sorting operations on Table objects.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

properties.name: matchCase
properties.description: Represents whether the casing impacted the last sort of the table.

properties.name: method
properties.description: Represents Chinese character ordering method last used to sort the table.

properties.name: fields
properties.description: Represents the current conditions used to last sort the table.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of conditions to sort on.

parameters.name: matchCase
parameters.description: Whether to have the casing impact string ordering.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The ordering method used for Chinese characters.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the sorting that is currently on the table. While this doesn't modify the table's ordering, it clears the state of the header buttons.

methods.name: reapply
methods.description: Reapplies the current sorting parameters to the table.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
